info.name: Panda-mania FurAffinity
info.description: A FurAffinity style by Cooped. Updated on 2014.08.13 for Chrome Users. I sorta borked yalls install. Read the release notes for details. Cute, fuzzy pandas have gotten hold of the template. Here's their take on it. Activation instructions in release notes. FA FurAffinity Black Slime Panda White Cooped
